tool_description: Helper API that offers various operations to aid in building and managing NLP models effectively
name: NLP Helper
title: NLP Helper

api_list.name: Generate Utterances
api_list.description: This operation allows users to generate utterances by accepting an array of complex phrases that adhere to the format specified in the examples below.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nlp-helper.p.rapidapi.com/api/utterances/generate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nlp-helper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nlp-helper.p.rapidapi.com/api/utterances/generate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nlp-helper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
